title: Dark Days (2000)
description:
DARK DAYS - Hardcore documentary - Original Score by DJ Shadow!!!

Dark Days is a pretty hardcore, but ultimately uplifting documentary with an awesome soundtrack scored by DJ Shadow.
This film is pretty rare, and has won a bunch of awards from Sundance Film Festival etc.
The documentary is about a group of homeless people who live in an abandoned New York subway tunnel in makeshift houses. They range from hopeless crackheads, to guys who were just sick of doing it tough above ground.

Some of this film is very gnarly, but some of it is actually really funny too.
It is extremely well filmed and put together by Marc Singer and well worth the download.

Enjoy my first upload! Please seed if you rate it!
